reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, comfortable, and soft, with one noting it stays soft through multiple washes.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Designer vibes
items.body: Beautifully oversized. It really has a nice weight to it but still very soft and comfortable. Looks designer. Very black color with sort of off white stitching. Nice dinner date outfit. Read more
items.author: Elle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing high quality sweater!
items.body: Amazing!! A very high quality look, fabric is soft and not scratchy! Buying other colors too!! Definitely oversized so size how you prefer the fit. Read more
items.author: Jennifer E. Gannaio

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sweater
items.body: This is a really nice sweater, just wish it was longer, and the neck part was a bit higher - that I feel is too short. but overall it is nice. Cute, did not have any wrinkles to complain about, it is heavy, warm and versatile. You can pretty much dress it up or down. the color is true as described. Read more
items.author: Jammie Freeman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy and warm
items.body: Absolutely perfect! I'm so happy I went by reviews and ordered this gem of a sweater. It's so pretty and made incredibly well. It's warm for fall and winter. It comes to my hips I'm 5'7 . I'm a 42 DD and this fit great! Very stretchy. I ordered the XXL . I love a good oversized sweater and this is it! I have it in black. I would order other colors but all I wear is black I always have uncomfortable in Black having the white stitching is a plus it breaks up the monotony of all my black LOL. Order it ladies you're going to love it! Read more
items.author: Darla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking oversized sweater!
items.body: I have been eyeing this sweater for some time. My daughter actually asked for one, which made me finally place the order. After getting the first delivery with the wrong item, we reordered and received exactly what we wanted. I ordered the brown sweater, and the color was exactly as escribed. It is an oversized sweater with some stretch so we sized down one size because I was worried the sleeves would be too long, glad we did. The material is soft, the oversized fit makes it very comfortable without looking sloppy. We had some snow today and it is the first time she is wearing it, keeps her warm so far. The sweater is versatile, it looks great with jeans but you can also wear it with a skirt. I like it so much I ordered one for myself. I am 5'10" and 137 lbs, I ordered the small. Pleased with my purchase. I will update soon with photos. Read more
items.author: Brenda G

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars RUNS VERY LARGE!!!!!
items.body: Nice looking. Very soft. I bought a size S. Read more
items.author: Emily Curran

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top quality, rich colors, expensive looking
items.body: I deliberated for days on what sizes and colors to get in this sweater reading each and every review painstakingly. For reference, I am 5 foot nine, 175lbs, sz 14. Because I am so tall, I like lots of length in my sweaters so I can wear them with leggings so I got a size large after reading that they were oversized. I am all about oversize clothing. I love the way it fits my tall frame with the drop-down shoulders and long length of sleeve. This sweater in a large was long enough to cover my bum so I could wear it easily with leggings and the sleeves came to my knuckles, which I adore! The size large was perfect for what I wanted it and I got it in black, which was a deep Rich black accenting the white stitching. I loved it so much. I decided to get more colors! The next color I got was coffee, which is a very dark brown. The season’s hottest fall color. I got it in a medium this time so I could wear it with my dark brown leather skirts and boots. The medium was shorter in the body, which was perfect because it would fall to my upper hip looking great with a skirt and still would look good with jeans. I have one more color to get because I want something loose and oversized to match all my low brown UGGs, so I’m going back for either the caramel or the khaki in a size large because I’ll be wearing it with just leggings. I hope this hell helps some of you that we’re on the fence like I was! Beautiful quality sweater at a very affordable price. Update: 3rd color is khaki in an L to wear with leggings, and Uggs, they are the perfect match! Love it! Read more
items.author: Jean Ford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Stylish Sweater Be Ready for All the Compliments
items.body: This sweater is great, the quality, style, comfort and the price absolutely fantastic. This sweater was a super big hit at a reunion gathering I attended last night. I got so many compliments. It really looked super great with the jewelry I wore with the sweater. I ordered this sweater in black and white it looked great with the black jeans and black boots I wore with this sweater. What’s great is this sweater will look great with any jeans, dress pants, skirts and even over a dress for a super stylish look. I highly recommend this sweater. I’m looking at ordering it a a few other colors. Read more
items.author: Philly Girl

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Navy Blue, Grey Pink, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
